internationalizations.description:
Situated in the Republic of North Ossetia-Alania, the Prestige Ltd. distillery was set up in 1999.The manufacturing plant has a daily production capacity of up to 9,000 decalitres. The company produces the ethyl alcohol brands 'Alpha', 'Luxe' and 'Extra', as well as a concentrate of ethyl alcohol head impurities and fusel oils. The alcohol produced by Prestige Ltd. is in high demand, and is used to produce many Russian vodka brands.

At Prestige Ltd., I acquired the skills of being highly attentive to detail and proficient in preventing faults in the production process. Through my experience, I learned to consistently monitor and adjust equipment to ensure optimal performance and maintain strict quality control standards, resulting in the production of high-quality ethanol.

E-tática is an agency specialized in solutions for e-commerce, digital marketing, and visual identity since 2008, working with large, small, and medium-sized businesses, offering to their clients the know-how in the integration of enterprise resource planning (ERP) and third-party APIs, such as custom payment providers. It does the integration of the internal management of the online platform and physical store, being certified by the main platforms in the market.

At E-tática I have worked to develop custom solutions for clients wholesale and retail, valuing the quality and continuity of projects in the medium and long term.

At Deevo Studio is a company specializing in web design and development with an extensive portfolio of cases, the result of 20 years of experience with other agencies and the corporate market. Their creations involve everything from brand development and visual identity to the creation of applications and websites, with a wide knowledge of Wordpress and Web Technologies.

At Deevo Studio, I had the chance to use the previously back-end knowledge combined with practical experience in JAVA development to accept the challenge to start an Android Development Department in the company, delivering complex Android Applications to companies in Brazil.
